          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">Az összetett mondatok</string>
            <string language="en-US">Complex Sentences</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Komplizierte Programmsätze</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Phrases Complexes</string>

          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">Ismételjük át, amit az összetett mondatokról tanultunk!</string>
            <string language="en-US">Let's Summarize What We Have Learnt About Complex Sentences!</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </description>

Frasi Complesse!</string>
          </description>
          <description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Resumamos Lo que Hemos aprendido Sobre 
Sentencias Complejas!</string>
